mdRecord.dcterms:title: North hyphen porch lift elevator at ground level, door open, showing lift controls on staircase newel
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lift elevator installed ca. 1992 as part of the pavilion renovation to provide handicapped access to the classrooms/conference rooms in the west (1850s) addition to the pavilion. Not in use by 2005; possibly removed. [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Photographs
